titleStmt.title: The Christianity of the people commonly called Quakers, asserted against the unjust charge of their being no Christians, upon several questions relating to these matters, wherein their Christian belief is questioned.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

titleStmt.title: The Christianity of the people commonly called Quakers, asserted against the unjust charge of their being no Christians, upon several questions relating to these matters, wherein their Christian belief is questioned.

notesStmt.note: Published anonymously. Authorship from other editions in Wing.
Presented in the form of question and answer.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
